name: Keyboard Man
description: You have a PhD in internet arguments. If someone says 'Good Morning', you ask for their source.

name: Fish Touching Pro
description: The ancient art of 'Mo Yu' (slacking off). You can look incredibly busy while actually browsing Weibo in a tiny window.

name: Social Cow
description: The opposite of social anxiety. You will loudly sing 'Happy Birthday' to a stranger in a hotpot restaurant just for a discount.

name: Social Terror
description: Making a phone call requires 30 minutes of mental preparation. You pray the delivery guy leaves the food at the door.

name: Boba Bloodline
description: Your body is 70% sugar and tapioca pearls. You treat dehydration with large cups of cheese-foam oolong.

name: Non-Chieftain
description: The 'Fei Qiu' (Unlucky African) gene. You never pull the SSR card until the hard pity mechanism kicks in.

name: Europe Emperor
description: The 'Ou Huang'. You pull the rarest character on a single free ticket. Your friends secretly hate you.

name: The Lever
description: A true 'Gang Jing'. Even if the boss says '1+1=2', you feel a biological urge to argue 'What about in binary?'

name: Mediterranean Future
description: Your hairline is retreating faster than the French army. A sign of great wisdom (or programming ability).

name: Lu Chi
description: You can get lost in your own bedroom. GPS navigation just confuses you more ('Turn East?' Where is East??).

name: Steel Straight Man
description: You have absolutely no romantic radar. If a girl says 'I'm cold', you tell her she should have brought a jacket.

name: Night Owl King
description: You become alive at 2 AM. Sleep is for the weak. Your liver is crying.

name: Urban Hukou
description: You hold a residency permit for a Tier-1 city. The gates to public services open easily for you.

name: Rural Hukou
description: Your residency is tied to your ancestral village. Moving to the city means living as a 'floater' without benefits.

name: System Insider
description: Your parents work for a state-owned enterprise (SOE) or the bureau. You know how the 'Iron Rice Bowl' works.

name: Migrant Roots
description: Your parents moved here for work. You are technically a 'local,' but you don't feel like one.

name: Little Emperor
description: You are an only child. You carry the crushing weight of your entire family's expectations alone.

name: Sister's Sacrifice
description: You have siblings. Resources were often diverted to the eldest son, or you had to care for younger ones.

name: Guanxi Network
description: Your family may not be rich, but they know a guy who knows a guy. Problems disappear after a phone call.

name: Thick Face
description: You understand that shame is a tool for others to control you. You refuse to be controlled.

name: Merchant Instinct
description: While others studied poetry, your family discussed profit margins at the dinner table.

name: Artistic Spirit
description: You care more about expression than stability. Your relatives constantly ask 'but can you eat art?'

name: Extra Workbooks
description: More exercises, more repetition. It’s boring, but it gives you a small head start when allocating stats.

name: Private Tutor
description: One-on-one tutoring helps you patch weaknesses fast. You start with more allocation points.

name: Elite Training Camp
description: A high-intensity program with top teachers and resources. You start with a big pool of allocation points.

name: International Track
description: Your family chose the 'Guoji Lu' (international route). Bilingual education, SAT prep, and dreams of foreign universities.

name: Left-Behind Child
description: Your parents are migrant workers in distant cities. You were raised by grandparents in the village, seeing your parents once a year during Spring Festival.

name: 996 Warrior
description: You embrace the '996' lifestyle: 9 AM to 9 PM, 6 days a week. 'Working overtime is a blessing,' said someone who owns a yacht.

name: Gaokao Repeater
description: One exam decides everything. You didn't make it the first time. Or the second. You know Maomao Factory's study halls better than your own bedroom.

name: Fuerdai
description: You are the 'Rich Second Generation'. Your father built an empire; you inherited a Porsche and a trust fund. People assume you're useless.

name: Hospital Connections
description: Your aunt is a department head, your uncle is a surgeon. When you get sick, you skip the 3-hour queue and go straight to the expert.

name: DingKe
description: Double Income, No Kids. You and your partner chose freedom over family lineage. Your parents are devastated. Your bank account is thriving.

name: Tongzhi
description: You are '同志' - part of the rainbow community. In a society obsessed with marriage and bloodlines, your identity is both invisible and impossible to hide.
